text:
Highlander II: The Quickening is a 1991 American science fiction action film directed by Russell Mulcahy and starring Christopher Lambert, Sean Connery, Virginia Madsen, and Michael Ironside. It is the second installment to the Highlander film series, and it was released on 12 April 1991 in the United Kingdom and November 1, 1991, in the United States.
The film has received negative reviews from critics and fans of the Highlander franchise for its retcons of the prior film, which drastically alter the series storyline and introduce a number of inconsistencies. Several alternative versions have been released by the filmmakers in an attempt to address these common complaints. The original theatrical edition is considered one of the worst films ever released.
